page.title: 06LIVINGSTON - MOTORWAY ACCESS
page.content: The M8 motorway passes to the north of the town close to Deans and Houston Industrial Estates. From there it is a distance of approximately 25 kilometres to Edinburgh and 18 kilometres to Edinburgh Airport. Glasgow is about 50 kilometres to the west. These cities can be reached quickly from Livingston - Glasgow with its airport in less than an hour and Edinburgh in around 30 minutes. This easy access makes the town attractive to a variety of industries as the motorway means that raw materials and manufactured goods can be moved quickly. The motorways and road links also help to attract people to the town both to live and to work. Some people live and work in Livingston but many who live in Livingston work in Edinburgh or Glasgow.
